message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure it's worth $900000 to me. I'm willing to pay $700000 for it. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $850000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $850000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. Can we discuss further?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $800000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere. I'm willing to sweeten the deal for you.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not sure if $800000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay $720000 for the product. I'm getting close to my budget, so I'd like to get a better deal.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $780000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $780000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not sure if $780000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. I've already made a significant concession, and I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.

I understand you've made a significant concession, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $760000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $760000. This is my final offer.
